title: Change "Remake" to "No Contest"
body:
As the remake function currently stands, it is a misnomer in that it doesn't restart the game with the nine present players and a new player, it just treats the game as though it never happened. 

Instead of calling the game remade, call it a No Contest, similar to when you quit out of a game of Smash Bros before it is finished.
